content: Hi, I've just read the meeting transcript from the meeting last week. I wanted to followup a bit on a few items:
• to help us track the agenda from meeting to meeting a bit better
I created this doc: https://hackmd.io/s/SysIzeMRE
my idea is that whoever wants can add a topic to discuss and at meeting time we can choose one of the TODO items and discuss it
thoughts?
• I am about to submit a PR to the compiler-team repo with meeting notes (EDIT: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/100)
• I added a few TODOs to the agenda above
@mark-i-m I think the idea is fine and more or less close to how is working for now
better to have the hackmd file and you proposed though
so :+1:
anyway, would be great to know from other participants
btw, have updated https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-guide/issues/319 and added the recent Polonius initialization and move tracking recording

I created this doc: https://hackmd.io/s/SysIzeMRE

Thank you! Subscribed to this document.

I wonder if it is possible to have a hierarchical document management. For example, individual meeting notes under a parent page so it is easy to keep a track of all the WG-Learning docs on hackmd/paper/etc. I see this meeting notes for example but it is a separate page.

Since we have tracking issue 319, I assume the Paper doc is not needed right?
I had a dream last night that most of the videos on issue 319 have been taken by someone and are done. :laughing:
FYI, I am in the process of moving countries (having lived in one for many years) so there is some delay in my responses but I am still here. :smile:
@Amanjeev Sethi
Currently the minutes are kept here: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/tree/master/working-groups/learning
I personally don't have a strong preference for how to organize them, but it seems that that is the format used by other WGs

Since we have tracking issue 319, I assume the Paper doc is not needed right?

Yes, I think we are only updating the issue now
Thank you @mark-i-m . I was a bit confused so thought of asking for clarification. Sorry about this. I have not seen other WGs much so if my questions sound stupid, please forgive me.
There is nothing to apologize for :heart: It is good for us to be all on the same page
